description: The underlying issue for CVE-2023-5484 is an inappropriate implementation in the navigation of Chromium-based browsers, specifically concerning how Microsoft Edge interacts with the Chromium open source software. This misimplementation allows for potential vulnerabilities to arise that could affect user interactions and browsing security. The flaw was addressed in the latest release version of Microsoft Edge, which is 118.0.2088.46, ensuring that the application is no longer vulnerable to the identified symptom. For further technical details and reassurances, the updates are cataloged under KB-118.0.2088.46 to assist administrators in tracking vulnerability resolutions efficiently.
